Title: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training
LinkTitle: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training

Pages.Title: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training
Pages.LinkTitle: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training

Questions.Label: Does your organisation's process for evaluating the quality of training delivered include apprenticeship training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This means your existing process includes how your organisation will:

  • respond and act on feedback from apprentices
  • continuously improve apprenticeship training
  • identify and address poor apprenticeship training

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation's process for evaluating the quality of training delivered includes apprenticeship training

Pages.Title: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training
Pages.LinkTitle: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training

Questions.Label: How will your organisation evaluate the quality of apprenticeship training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • respond and act on feedback from employers and apprentices
  • continuously improve apprenticeship training
  • identify and address poor apprenticeship training

You'll also need to include any systems or processes your organisation will use to assess the quality of apprenticeship training.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will evaluate the quality of apprenticeship training

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Pages.Title: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training
Pages.LinkTitle: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training

Questions.Label: How will your organisation evaluate the quality of apprenticeship training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • respond and act on feedback from employers, lead providers and apprentices
  • continuously improve apprenticeship training
  • identify and address poor apprenticeship training

You'll also need to include any systems or processes your organisation will use to assess the quality of apprenticeship training.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will evaluate the quality of apprenticeship training

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Pages.Title: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training
Pages.LinkTitle: Process of evaluating the quality of apprenticeship training

Questions.Label: How will your organisation review its process for evaluating the quality of training delivered?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • regularly review the process - for example, quarterly or yearly
  • identify gaps and make improvements to the process
  • ensure quality is maintained throughout the process

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will review its process for evaluating the quality of training delivered

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less
